Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: ~skarim can you comment on why the OID was chosen in your commit?

Action.author: skarim
Action.body: ~jyellick I don't have a good answer, this was code that I only ported over to fabric from fabric-ca. The original package was written by Keith, and the OID came from that. I am not sure what was behind his reasoning for choosing that value.

Action.author: smithbk
Action.body: As you can probably tell from the sequence number, this was a randomly chosen OID. IIRC, I looked around for an official one to register under but obviously is something that fell thru the cracks.
